tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE machinery_maintenance_schedule (
    machinery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE machinery_repair_schedule (
    repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machinery_id INT,
    repair_type VARCHAR(50),
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_cost DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (machinery_id) REFERENCES machinery_maintenance_schedule(machinery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE repair_schedule (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   machinery_id INT,
   repair_date DATE,
   repair_description TEXT,
   technician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE machine_details (
  machine_id INT,
  machine_name VARCHAR(100),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  installation_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
  maintenance_id INT,
  machine_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  technician_id INT
);
